sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Card, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'
const Blog = ({ blog }) => (
  <Card border="primary" style={{ width: '80rem' ,padding:'15px' }}>
    <Card.Header>Author :{blog.author}</Card.Header>
    <Card.Body>
      <Card.Title>Title: {blog.title}</Card.Title>
      <Card.Text>
        {blog.name}
      </Card.Text>
    </Card.Body>
  </Card>


)

export default Blog
